testCases.label: Verify adding a new student
testCases.description: Ensures that StudentService.addStudent correctly saves a student using the StudentRepository and returns the saved entity.

testCases.label: Verify assigning a classroom to a student
testCases.description: Checks that a classroom is correctly assigned to a student and that the repository methods findById and save are invoked appropriately.

testCases.label: Verify retrieving a student's classroom
testCases.description: Ensures StudentService.getClassroomOfStudent returns the correct classroom after fetching the student by ID.

testCases.label: Verify unassigning a student's classroom
testCases.description: Ensures that a student's classroom is set to null and that repository interactions (findById, save) occur as expected.
